scripts.typegenall: typechain artifacts/contracts/payments/methods/Index.sol/Payments.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/hounds/Index.sol/Hounds.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/arenas/Index.sol/Arenas.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/genetics/Index.sol/Genetics.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/incubator/Index.sol/Incubator.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/ogars/Data.sol/HoundracePotions.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/queues/Index.sol/Queues.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/races/Index.sol/Races.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/generator/Index.sol/Generator.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads && typechain artifacts/contracts/randomness/Index.sol/Randomness.json --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=$TYPEGEN_ALL_PATH --always-generate-overloads
scripts.safe-hardhat-test: echo 'Recommended for node > 16.x' && export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && hardhat test
